ref: 12428 *śikyadhara, cf. śikyādhāra -- (~ śikyā -- dhr̥ta -- Nīlak.) m. ʻ hook at the end of the pole which carries the looped cord for holding the strings of a balance ʼ W. [śikyà -- , dhara -- ]
Mth. sikahar ʻ net for hanging up pots &c. in a house ʼ.
